CustomField.description: Shows five main segments being planned for FY16-18.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Industry,"Accounting"),"Accounting", IF(ISPICKVAL(Industry,"Consulting"),"Consulting", IF(ISPICKVAL(Industry,"Legal"), Case(Intapp_Master_Ranking__c, 1,"Legal Global", 2,"Legal Global", 3,"Legal Global", 4,"Legal Global", 5,"Legal Global", 8,"Legal Global", 9,"Legal Global", 12,"Legal Global", 13,"Legal Global", 16,"Legal Global", 17,"Legal Global", 18,"Legal Global", 19,"Legal Global", 20,"Legal Global", 25,"Legal Global", 87,"Legal Global", 89,"Legal Global", 97,"Legal Global", 120,"Legal Global", IF(Intapp_Master_Ranking__c < 331, "Legal Large (1-330 Nonglobal)", IF(Intapp_Master_Ranking__c < 681, "Legal Mid (331-680)", "Legal Other"))), "Other Industry")))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Shows five main segments being planned for FY16-18.
CustomField.label: Segment for FY18
